statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data;
SELECT activity_id, waste_type FROM carbon_footprint_data ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling';
SELECT activity_id, carbon_emission FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_emission > 10;
SELECT disposal_method, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM carbon_footprint_data GROUP BY disposal_method ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_emission > 100 ORDER BY waste_type ASC, disposal_method DESC;
SELECT activity_id, waste_type, carbon_emission FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE disposal_method LIKE '%landfill%' ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT activity_id, waste_type, carbon_emission FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE waste_type IN ('Plastic', 'Paper') ORDER BY activity_id;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_emission < 50 AND disposal_method = 'Recycling' ORDER BY carbon_emission;
SELECT activity_id, SUM(carbon_emission) as total_emission FROM carbon_footprint_data GROUP BY activity_id HAVING total_emission > 500 ORDER BY total_emission DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_activities;
SELECT activity_name, carbon_cost FROM waste_disposal_activities WHERE carbon_cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_data WHERE weight < 500;
SELECT activity_name, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_activities ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT activity_name, carbon_cost FROM waste_disposal_activities WHERE carbon_cost > 100 ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_data WHERE weight > 500 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT disposal_activity_id, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_data GROUP BY disposal_activity_id HAVING total_weight > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_activities WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' OR disposal_method = 'Incineration';
SELECT MAX(carbon_cost) AS max_carbon_cost, MIN(carbon_cost) AS min_carbon_cost FROM waste_disposal_activities;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalSites;
SELECT site_name, landfill_capacity FROM WasteDisposalSites WHERE landfill_capacity > 100;
SELECT site_name, recycling_capacity FROM WasteDisposalSites ORDER BY recycling_capacity DESC;
SELECT record_id, disposal_date, waste_type, disposal_weight FROM WasteDisposalRecords WHERE waste_type='Plastic';

SELECT site_name, disposal_date, total_emission FROM WasteDisposalSites JOIN WasteDisposalRecords ON WasteDisposalSites.site_id = WasteDisposalRecords.site_id JOIN CarbonFootprintCalculations ON WasteDisposalRecords.record_id = CarbonFootprintCalculations.record_id WHERE total_emission > 5000;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalSites ORDER BY site_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT site_name, landfill_capacity, recycling_capacity FROM WasteDisposalSites WHERE landfill_capacity > 1000 AND recycling_capacity > 500 ORDER BY landfill_capacity, recycling_capacity DESC

SELECT site_name, disposal_date, waste_type, disposal_weight FROM WasteDisposalSites JOIN WasteDisposalRecords ON WasteDisposalSites.site_id = WasteDisposalRecords.site_id WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY disposal_weight DESC

SELECT site_name, landfill_capacity, recycling_capacity FROM WasteDisposalSites WHERE landfill_capacity >= 5000 UNION SELECT site_name, landfill_capacity, recycling_capacity FROM WasteDisposalSites WHERE recycling_capacity >= 2000 ORDER BY site_name
SELECT calculation_id, emission_rate, total_emission FROM CarbonFootprintCalculations WHERE emission_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY total_emission DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_activities;
SELECT activity_name, waste_type FROM waste_disposal_activities WHERE carbon_emission > 0;
SELECT area_name, city, state FROM waste_collection_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(collected_weight) AS average_weight, MAX(collected_weight) AS max_weight FROM waste_collection_log WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT activity_name, waste_type, carbon_emission FROM waste_disposal_activities WHERE carbon_emission IS NOT NULL ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_activities WHERE carbon_emission > 50 ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, city, state FROM waste_collection_areas WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY area_name DESC;

SELECT activity_name, waste_type, carbon_emission FROM waste_disposal_activities JOIN carbon_emission_factors ON waste_disposal_activities.waste_type = carbon_emission_factors.waste_type ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_log WHERE collected_weight < 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM waste_collection_areas ORDER BY city;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, location_lat, location_long FROM WasteFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, contact_email FROM WasteCompanies WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT category_name, carbon_intensity FROM WasteCategories WHERE recycling_percentage > 50;
SELECT facility_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM WasteDisposalRecords GROUP BY facility_id;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM WasteFacilities WHERE facility_id = 1
SELECT company_name, contact_email FROM WasteCompanies ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT category_name, recycling_percentage FROM WasteCategories WHERE carbon_intensity > 0.5
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalRecords INNER JOIN WasteCategories ON WasteDisposalRecords.category_id = WasteCategories.category_id
